A stasis pod goes through the atmosphere and as it exits the 
atmosphere it crashes to the ground.It starts scanning for animals to 
copy.It copies a dragon.It comes out of the pod and sees the 
chivtrons base he opens a comm link to the base.
Apocalypse:Greetings I would like to join your group.
